website_summaries.verdict: A long leather jacket designed for multiple use cases, from professional welding to at-home barbecuing.
pros: The longer length provides added coverage
Handy pocket accommodates some smaller tools
cons: Some owners dislike the strong leather odor

customer_reviews.title: Missing some quality control...
customer_reviews.text: This item seemed to be exactly what we needed, but the quality is substandard. For the front, in one photo, the leather used was not completely finished on the inside and worse, before even beginning to use, a spot or two is almost through the leather itself. The sleeve was similar for unfinished, but usable. Rather difficult to get through to Amazon at this time of year, we have pondered exchanging, if even possible and may just have to return. BTW, these do run a bit small, or at least this one did.... I normally wear an XL shirt and this one is snug; doable, but snug.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: No more welder burns!!
customer_reviews.text: No more welder burns!! I love it. It works great!! I've only had this welder apron a few days, but I've been using it constantly. It does fit me a little snug in the shoulder width, which is fine with me. I'm 5' 10' about 190 lbs, but I think it would feel a little small if you were much bigger than I am.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy! It covers everything! The only thing is if you don't like the smell of leather like I do, you'll have to spray it with odor remover such as febreeze or air freshener!
customer_reviews.author: Nilo s

customer_reviews.title: Haven't gotten burned yet
customer_reviews.text: While the jacket is fairly bulky, that's good. Stick, Mig, Flux core, in overhead, I haven't gotten burned by anything yet. The fact that the back is open some helps with cooling some. Pocket in the center front is big enough for my safety glasses. It may not be needed for every welding job, but it works when I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimsey

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket isn't the thickest welding jacket I have ever seen, but for the price it is a very good value. It easily keeps slag off my front. It's open in the back like a lot of welding jackets. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUR MECHANIC LOVES THIS WELDING JACKET HE SAYS ITS PERFECT TO FIT ALL AREAS WHEN WELDING HE IS VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: OUR MECHANIC LOVES THIS WELDING JACKET HE SAYS ITS PERFECT TO FIT ALL AREAS WHEN WELDING HE IS VERY WELL PROTECTED THE QUALITY AND PRICE WAS BEST PRICE THAN OUR LOCAL PARTS STORE TO PURCHASE SAME ITEM
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’m 250lbs and this fit me fine. Good quality leather and solidly built. It does get hot when you wear it, so I expect I’ll have to have it dry-cleaned once it starts getting funky. :-)
customer_reviews.author: A.V.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of coverage, good price
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. I typically wear size large clothes and this fits, but not a lot of extra room. As others have pointed out, the smell (like a bag of dog's rawhide bones) is a little much at first but slowly fades.
customer_reviews.author: davel

customer_reviews.title: Great protection in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and is very comfortable. Provides great protection when working in tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: pablalock

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift!!! Perfect. If your an extra large this would be too small or very tight. My husband is a large, in just a shirt it is comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie1

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Product as described with Amazon Prime handling. Color bleeds when sweating. As "one size fits most" this will be tight if you are XL and almost impossible fit if larger.
customer_reviews.author: OCdad

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use it yet, but have tried it on and feels like it won't fall apart easy and the stitching will hold well. not to thick, but not thin where it will rip easy.
customer_reviews.author: rachid Arnick

customer_reviews.title: Leather vest
customer_reviews.text: This leather vest I have used. It did good. Better then get burnt that is fur sure. I am glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Great welding cowhide!
customer_reviews.text: Great protection and value. Looks like it might last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this sleeved apron, it is more than suitable for the welding I do on my equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good protection & airy open back.
customer_reviews.text: Good thickness and fantastic coverage. Open back is great for hot environment. Was a tad worried it will be too hot to work in.
customer_reviews.author: SKL

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for 5’10” two hundred lb. person.
customer_reviews.text: I use the apron for light welding and melting lead for reloading. Product was as advertised I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept me from being burned while welding under my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Ty B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, good coverage, decently thick material, powerful initial smell but expected from new leather
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly like the picture fits great have not used at work yet
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Thick leather 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Great thick jacket. The only reason I give it four stars is because after you wear it the inside leather fibers come off when your cloths. But maybe after lots of uses it’ll stop doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy and comfortable. It's good quality and it's safe for welding. Thank u and I ordered again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I am so far very pleased with the fit and quality of the leather
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving the welding apron 4 stars is because I haven't had it very long. I am so far very pleased with the fit and quality of the leather. The price was very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Abplanalp

product_meta.title: Leather Welding Jackets 103CM Length Long Welding Apron, Flame Resistant Welder Clothes Coat with Sleeves, Wear-resistant Anti-scald Welding Cape for Most Men WQ23
feature_bullets: Material: This welding tool apron is made of cowhide split leather, wear-resistant, anti-scald, flame-resistant
Size: L/104X54cm/ 41"(Length)X21" (Shoulder Width), XL/ 116X60cm/ 45"(Length)X23" (Shoulder Width) for your chosen, fit height: 68.90"-74.80"
Desigh: High collar, double stitched seams, adjustable straps + belts, protecting you from welding spatter and heat
Perfect gift: sure to be appreciated by electric welder or someone who is going for BBQ,grinding,woodcutting etc

▶Value Package Meal: 1 Welding Apron+ 24 hours customer email service+ 100% satisfaction guarantee+ Fast Delivery. We are confident with our Apronquality, if you are not satisfied with our product in any time, feel free to contact us, you will get a full refund with no question asked.
